meaningMnemonic: You only hold someone in <kanji>high</kanji> <kanji>esteem</kanji> if they are really <vocabulary>high</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>noble</vocabulary> people. They have to be <vocabulary>refined</vocabulary> to be held so highly by you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
